TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
Less funny and more of nightmare fuel:

![screenshot244.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/56154768/KSP%20.23/screenshot244.png)

IIRC it was the life support mod that caused this.

Also do gifs count?

> 4 hours ago, Corona688 said:
>

> Wait, wait, how did you get the orange suit on EVA?
> 

[TextureReplacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/96851-11-texturereplacer-2413-442016/#comment-1658372) and [@GregroxMun](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/36077-gregroxmun/)'s [Coloured IVA/EVA suits](http://spacedock.info/mod/121/GregroxMun%27s%20Colored%20IVA/EVA%20Suits).

(And that's actually red, not orange.)
Why is suit-color a 50 meg mod?  Is there no moderation in texture sizes any more?  ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif ":confused:")

Hey [@NovaSilisko](%7B___base_url___%7D/index.php?/profile/3897-novasilisko/), I bet you thought you'd escaped this one :v

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-28T01:49:02Z" title="07/28/2016 01:49  AM" data-short="7 yr">July 28, 2016</time> by foamyesque**

The helicopter was suposed to <u>rescue</u> him:

![3Vzjw44.png](http://i.imgur.com/3Vzjw44.png)

When you abort just-in-time:

![H2SdRWX.png](http://i.imgur.com/H2SdRWX.png)

That feel when you splash down in your EVA suit.

![8ae6480ad9.png](https://puu.sh/qjT8A/8ae6480ad9.png)

Spoiler

![VdIoRX6.png](http://i.imgur.com/VdIoRX6.png)

Just look at their faces not a single emotion of concern!

Here are some more or less funny picks from my collection.

Now That was a little too close. Remind me never to do that again.

![9uhBYoe.png](http://i.imgur.com/9uhBYoe.png)

No, that was not a failed takeoff, that was me hitting the edge of the deck with my nose wheel during landing.

And in case you where wondering, i was actually able to wiggle my self free tough it did take some time and fuel.

I did end up laughing quite a bit after that little "eventful landing".

Lets just say that i was a LITTLE tired.

![2qsZlsn.png](http://i.imgur.com/2qsZlsn.png)

(the aircraft in the pick is part of an upcoming post, same as the ex cargo-ramp)

That is infact me "flying" around in circles around <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center"><abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr></abbr> with an ex cargo-ramp riding on my wing.

Umm...i don't think it fits.

![5Fcp1DD.png](http://i.imgur.com/5Fcp1DD.png)

(the hovercraft in this pick is a failed attempt at creating an SRN-4 hovercraft replica. It was laggy, super heavy, slow and drank a little too much fuel).

Here are a couple of picks from my very early carrier tests:

![5YWhoxO.png](http://i.imgur.com/5YWhoxO.png)

They where just casually floating there, defying physics. HOW.

![xC74zqv.png](http://i.imgur.com/xC74zqv.png)

Yea, Kraken came buy to say hi and broke things by a BIT.

![4KJwcEU.png](http://i.imgur.com/4KJwcEU.png)

Seems that the R/D center is made out of paper, i crashed into it at **3 m/s** and it blew up.

![hgtTe0p.png](http://i.imgur.com/hgtTe0p.png)

I had a head on collision with the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr>, looks like i won.

And there they are, all of the funniest picks that i have.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-31T20:14:45Z" title="07/31/2016 08:14  PM" data-short="7 yr">July 31, 2016</time> by kapteenipirk**

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, kapteenipirk said:
> 
> 
> I had a head on collision with the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr></abbr></abbr>, looks like i won.
> 

I think it's based on impact tolerance. I hit the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr> with an entire kickback booster, and the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building"><abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr></abbr> won.  (I like to imagine it left one hell of a dent.)  So if you hit it with modded parts with silly-high impact tolerances, it'll break.

Or just wheels, which have stupidly high "impact tolerances" which don't seem related to the point they actually break at.
